properties.name: atmosphere.servlet-path
properties.description: URL mapping for the Atmosphere servlet.

properties.name: atmosphere.packages
properties.description: Comma-separated list of packages to scan for Atmosphere annotations (@ManagedService, @AtmosphereHandlerService, etc.).

properties.name: atmosphere.session-support
properties.description: Whether to enable HTTP session support for Atmosphere resources.

properties.name: atmosphere.broadcaster-class
properties.description: Fully qualified class name of the Broadcaster implementation to use.

properties.name: atmosphere.broadcaster-cache-class
properties.description: Fully qualified class name of the BroadcasterCache implementation to use.

properties.name: atmosphere.websocket-support
properties.description: Whether to enable WebSocket transport support.

properties.name: atmosphere.heartbeat-interval-in-seconds
properties.description: Heartbeat interval in seconds for keeping connections alive.

properties.name: atmosphere.init-params
properties.description: Additional Atmosphere servlet init parameters (escape hatch for any ApplicationConfig property).

properties.name: atmosphere.durable-sessions.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable durable session support (survive server restarts).

properties.name: atmosphere.durable-sessions.session-ttl-minutes
properties.description: Time-to-live for durable sessions in minutes.

properties.name: atmosphere.durable-sessions.cleanup-interval-seconds
properties.description: Interval in seconds between expired session cleanup runs.
